Name: Issue 291
Introduction: Happy 2021 everyone! We hope that everyone has had a bit of a break over the New Year and we are back for 2021.  It's going to be an exciting year, with Xamarin.Forms 5.0 being released and the road to Maui. All the best, and thanks for joining us again for another year. ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms 5.0 is Here!
Articles.Description: Say hello to the stable release of Xamarin.Forms, version 5.0. This major release delivers hundreds of quality improvements and brings to stable release new features including App Themes, Brushes, CarouselView, RadioButton, Shapes and Paths, and SwipeView.
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Asking for app reviews with 1 line of code!
Articles.Description: James shows us how to request App Reviews using Xamarin.Essentials with just a single line of code.

Articles.Title: Xamarin Pipeline Demo
Articles.Description: Demo and explanation on how to do several common tasks for Xamarin.Forms Android in an Azure DevOps pipeline on a Microsoft-hosted agent. Tasks include: build-based version, APK signing, publishing artifacts, unit tests, and UI tests.
Articles.Author: Jacob Egner

Articles.Title: How to Debug on a Real Android Device
Articles.Description: Debugging allows us to see our app's flow and to find and fix errors. Let’s see how to do this with Xamarin on an Android device.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Enabling the Fancy iOS Picture In Picture Video Player on Xamarin
Articles.Description: Picture In Picture (PIP) was introduced years ago in iOS 9, but it was only available for iPads. It was brought to iPhones recently in iOS 14, so Sameer implement it in his app.
Articles.Author: Saamer Mansoor

Articles.Title: Embedding a JavaScript Interpreter Into Xamarin Apps With Jint
Articles.Description: By integrating Jint, we can add JavaScript support into our Xamarin.Forms apps. With an embedded JavaScript interpreter, we can write parts of our apps logic in JavaScript and through data and implement a "lite" form of code push.
Articles.Author: Matthew Robbins

Articles.Title: Xamarin Essentials: Features, Advantages and Benefits
Articles.Description: Xamarin Essentials adds all kinds of useful APIs in a single NuGet package. Let's learn the basics of Xamarin essentials as we take a look!
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Christmas Shopping UI in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Here is another great Xamarin.Forms UI Challenge by Leomaris with a cool Christmas themed layout.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Popups using Rg.Plugins.Popup
Articles.Description: Allesandro talks about how to use Rg.Plugins.Popup to create customizable popups for Xamarin.Forms, including awaiting results.
Articles.Author: Alessandro Caliaro

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms 5 LAUNCH PARTY!!!!!!
Articles.Description: Join David Ortinau,  Maddy Leger, and some of the Xamarin.Forms engineering team while we celebrate launching Xamarin.Forms 5.0, our favorite release yet!!!
Articles.Author: Xamarin Developers

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms 5 with David Ortinau
Articles.Description: Xamarin.Forms 5.0 has just been released. And it's all Xamarin.Forms 5 all the time in this special podcast! Principal Program Manager David Ortinau join James and Matt to lead them through all the new exciting bits in Xamarin.Forms 5.0.
Articles.Author: The Xamarin Podcast

Articles.Title: 60 Second Tutorials
Articles.Description: David Ortinau has a fantastic collection of quick-hit Xamarin.Forms tutorials over on his YouTube channel.
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Create a macOS App From Your Xamarin.iOS App
Articles.Description: You already have an iOS app? How about adding a macOS app for free, without any effort. In this video Gerald will show you how to do that! By installing just this one plugin the Mac Catalyst variant of your app is built automatically.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms XAML 101
Articles.Description: James is back with another Xamarin.Forms 101 video! This week he is looking at using XAML to build user interfaces.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Secure Your Xamarin App with Fingerprint or Face Recognition
Articles.Description: The Fingerprint plugin allows you to secure your app or parts of your app with biometric security, so think Touch ID, Face ID and the Android, Mac and UWP fingerprint scanners.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: MVVM 101
Articles.Description: James has another 101 video , this time on architecture with MVVM, data binding, commanding, and more.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict 235: Holiday Hack Success!
Articles.Description: We did it! We finished (mostly) our holiday hacks, so tune in to figure out what we did!
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict
